name: Tina Grochowski
text: Used to love this place.  Salad bar was dirty with an empty salad bowl, nothing like it used to be many different items.  Nilla cookies?  Who puts that on their salad?  Breadsticks came out with the pizza and our pan pizza looked horrific! …More

text: I can't say enough about the 2 guys that were working there today.  They are truly an asset to the location.  The buffet is great too!

text: This used to be our go to spot for years without any problems. Over the past 5 years it has gone downhill completely and we have stopped going completely now.

text: Worst service ever. Waited over 20 minutes for our order to be taken. Waited over an hour to get our food. Manager was very rude, even told the delivery driver to stop answering the phone. Waited til we were almost done with our meals …More

name: Adam D
text: Only stopped to pick up an online order.  The order was accurate and I was waited on very quickly.    I'd suggest some more modern decor and/or remodel if they want more dine in business but the core experience was fine for me.

text: Good food. Waited here while first class tint ripped me off

name: Bryan Belnap
text: I've missed the all-you-can-eat buffets. This location was nice. Reminds me of the post-T-ball game pizza runs. Better pizza than the other buffets. Kid and Senior friendly.

name: Jodi Godown Hilt
text: All you can eat at lunch for 5.99. Salad bar could use some love. Items are not always fresh. You get what yoy pay for.

name: brian mitchell
text: My family and I order take out from this Pizza Hut frequently. Steve and his staff are friendly and the store is clean. As a consistent patron of this location I see noting that needs improvement. Keep up the good work.

name: Christine Domen
text: It is kind of small! Pizza was hot! Happy there is a Pizza Hut you can eat at and that has a buffet!! You need MORE dine in Pizza Huts!!

text: I like their $5 pizza and pasta deal, because I really like their pasta!

name: E Hotchkiss
text: Terrible service. Have to get your own plates and go up to the counter to ask for napkins, silverware & refills if there's more than two tables in the dining area. Always one server no matter how busy. Filthy bathrooms. Same curtains from 1988. No joke. Save yourself a stomach ache and don't go here.

name: Marcato Marchetti
text: One of the few pizza huts that still does the buffet! Yum! Everytime I visit family in the area, we go.

text: Pizza hut breadsticks are great. Pizza is waaayyyyy too greasy. And I live in Nazareth yet they dont deliver to me pff.

text: The workers in here are nice, but super slow. They are very unorganized and they seem to not want to be here. Very relaxed, however we waited what seemed to be an eternity. as for the food both pizzas  we ordered were alright, but were lacking flavor in the sauces.

name: Cody Palmer
text: Air conditioning isn't working. It was 95 degrees today. I walked in, felt the heat from the kitchen which made the dining area miserable, and walked out. Whoever runs this business should feel ashamed for forcing their employees to work in …More
